Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier
Remarks:
R0103: At least one of L11-01 or L11-03 is required
P0102: If either L11-01 or L11-02 is present, then the other is required

Name: Description
Notes: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
